THE-GAME.TITLE: OBJECTIVE: ESCAPE THE TOWER
THE-GAME.SUBTITLE: Recover your memories, discover your abilities and fight for your freedom.
THE-GAME.MIDDLE-TITLE: Sometimes, the only solution is to run
THE-GAME.MIDDLE-PARAGRAPH: JustRun is a 3D FPS action game set in a mysterious tower, where each floor offers a new gameplay experience.
THE-GAME.BOX-1-TEXT: The game offers a story that questions your morals and challenges your choices, all in a rich futuristic universe.
THE-GAME.BOX-2-TEXT: Equipped with your multi-function weapon, upgrade your skills throughout the game. Fight the enemy and discover the truth.
THE-GAME.BOX-3-TEXT: Evolve in a stressful environment while avoiding being killed by the army of robots that guard the building.

MEDIAS.TITLE: MEDIAS
MEDIAS.PARAGRAPH: Here are some screenshots of our game. You will find pictures, videos and music made with love by our team.

TEAM.TITLE: OUR TEAM
TEAM.PARAGRAPH: Our team is now composed of 19 different people of all ages and backgrounds.  We are all volunteers, and work around the same passion: video games.

CONTACT.TITLE: CONTACT US
CONTACT.PARAGRAPH: Want to get in touch?  You can reach us by filling out the form below and we will try to answer you as soon as possible.
CONTACT.OTHER: You can also contact us on our social networks :
